sentence.Network_cn: 观众们出奇地安静，只是在每首歌结束后报以礼貌性的掌声。

entry.tran: 闷闷不乐的;抑郁的;默不作声的
entry.def: Someone who is subdued is very quiet, often because they are sad or worried about something.

example.ex: He faced the press, initially, in a somewhat subdued mood...
example.tran: 他最初面对媒体时情绪有点忧郁。

example.ex: The audience are strangely subdued, clapping politely after each song.
example.tran: 观众们出奇地安静，只是在每首歌结束后报以礼貌性的掌声。

entry.def: Subdued sounds are not very loud.

example.ex: The conversation around them was resumed, but in subdued tones.
example.tran: 他们周围的人又开始交谈了，但这次是窃窃私语。

entry.def: Subdued lights or colours are not very bright.

means.word_mean: 4. lacking in light; not bright or harsh;

auth_sentence.content: He seemed subdued, and his voice was raspy.
auth_sentence.res_content: He seemed subdued, and his voice was raspy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He seemed subdued, and his voice was raspy.

auth_sentence.content: Millie had been of late...more subdued, less boisterous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Millie had been of late...more subdued, less boisterous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Millie had been of late...more subdued, less boisterous.

auth_sentence.content: The subdued...surroundings of this elegant French restaurant soothe patrons.
auth_sentence.res_content: The subdued...surroundings of this elegant French restaurant soothe patrons.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The subdued...surroundings of this elegant French restaurant soothe patrons.

means.word_mean: 不太响亮、强烈、显著等的,缓和的,有节制的

sentences.en: The subdued talk in the room faded down.
sentences.cn: 屋里低声的谈话安静下来了。

sentences.en: She was dressed in grey and looked suitably subdued.
sentences.cn: 她身穿灰色衣服，看上去颜色柔和，很得体。

means.word_mean: 不大兴奋、不甚感兴趣等的

sentences.en: Breakfast was a very subdued affair.
There is a subdued atmosphere in the school at exam time.
sentences.cn: 在考试期间，学校里有一种压抑的氛围。

sentences.en: I felt strangely subdued when it was all over.
sentences.cn: 一切都结束的时候，我却有一种奇怪的压抑感。
